title: The 'security team of yesterday' has to go
text:
02 The 'security team of yesterday' has to go 
Healthcare IT News: Data security isn't what it used to be. With today's threat landscape, the stereotypically introverted, more-into-computers-than-people techie isn't going to cut it as CISO. And there are plenty of people who will tell you why."You can have the most stellar security team," said Connie Barrera, chief information security officer of the six-hospital Jackson Health System in Miami, "and if they're the security team from yesterday – the ones in that dark room behind the locked doors that were really unapproachable, never really seen and never interacted with people – that's a problem," she said.
